channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: This smart home controller is literally a piece of wood
item.description: One of the fun parts of being a tech journalist for over a decade is that occasionally you get to watch a truly unique gadget go from concept to reality - and, eventually, into your living room. That's the case with the Mui Board, a smart home controller built into a piece of wood. The […]

item.title: I punched my way through Yakuza Kiwami 2 on Nintendo Switch 2, and it’s a decent port of an excellent RPG
item.description: Yakuza Kiwami 2 plays pretty well on Nintendo Switch 2, and being able to take Kiryu’s adventure on the go is a big bonus.

item.title: The 30 most exciting new shows of 2026: TechRadar's top TV picks on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max, and more
item.description: There'll be lots of great new TV shows this year – here are our top choices for early 2026, plus some to look out for in the months ahead.

item.title: CES 2026: What to expect from tech's big January conference
item.description: The new year is upon us, and that means CES 2026 is imminent. The biggest tech trade show of the calendar comes with a bevy of new and notable announcements that set the tone for trends and expectations for the subsequent 12 months. The CES 2026 show floor is officially open from January 6 through 9, but the fun kicks off with events on Sunday January 4, followed by a host of press conferences on Monday. As always, product demos, announcements and networking will be happening at the Las Vegas Convention Center and other hotels all over the city. As usual, Engadget will be covering the event in...

item.title: The new Clicks Power Keyboard can turn your phone into a BlackBerry – and it doubles as a wireless charger too
item.description: The Clicks Powerkeyboard will wirelessly charge your phone and gives you a physical keyboard as well.

item.title: On a testé la Xiaomi Electric Scooter 5 Plus : une trottinette électrique avec des roues de 12 pouces qui offre une belle sérénité
item.description: Première trottinette électrique 12 pouces de la marque, la Xiaomi Electric Scooter 5 Plus apporte de la sérénité. Elle grimpe aussi en dimensions, tout en ne prenant aucun risque côté design et partie électrique. Nous l'avons testé, voici notre verdict.

item.title: Framework Laptop 16 (RTX 5070) Review: A Dream Come True
item.description: With upgradable graphics, the Framework Laptop 16 achieves what PC nerds have only ever dreamed of.

item.title: CES 2026: all the news, gadgets, and innovations from the biggest tech show
item.description: Hot on the heels of new year’s celebrations, the annual Consumer Electronics Show will get underway in early January 2026. Once again, Las Vegas will host a sprawling sneak peek at the tech that will shape the industry throughout 2026. The Verge will be on the ground at CES 2026 covering the biggest announcements, press […]

item.title: Using Atari’s 2600+ Pac-Man edition takes me back to pumping all my pocket money into arcades
item.description: Atari’s Pac-Man-themed retro console has me reliving childhood memories all over again and returned me to a simpler, pixelated past.

item.title: Beyond VPN protection – how NordVPN changed in 2025, and what’s in store for 2026
item.description: From post-quantum encryption to censorship unblocking and scam protection, next year NordVPN is set to finish the work started in 2025. Here's all you need to know.

item.title: Flagship phone camera clash: I compared photos from the iPhone 17 Pro, Google Pixel 10 Pro, and Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra – here's what I discovered
item.description: Apple's, Google's and Samsung's latest and greatest all offer great cameras, but which one is best for you?

item.title: Nothing Phone (3a) Pro dans un pack à -30 %, TV Philips OLED Ambilight 144 Hz à 730 € et Meta Quest 3 512 Go à prix cassé — les deals de la semaine
item.description: Vous n’avez pas eu le temps de suivre les bons plans de la semaine ? Voici ce que vous a loupé : le Nothing Phone (3a) Pro est dans un pack à -30 %, un TV Philips OLED Ambilight et 144 Hz à seulement 730 € et le Meta Quest 3 512 Go à prix cassé.
